displayName: Prediction Coordinator - High Error Rate or No Runs

documentation.content:
The prediction coordinator has either experienced a high error rate (>5%) or has not run successfully in the past 25 hours. This may indicate:
- Cloud Run service failure
- Cloud Scheduler misconfiguration
- Feature store unavailability
- Model serving errors

Action Required:
1. Check Cloud Run logs for prediction-coordinator
2. Verify Cloud Scheduler job is enabled
3. Check feature store availability
4. Review recent deployments

Docs: docs/08-projects/current/prediction-system-optimization/track-c-infrastructure/RUNBOOK.md
